statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.12}+{4.6}\right)}={19.44}\approx{19.44}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{4.6}\cdot{4.87}={22.402}\approx{22.4}.
